resources.string: "%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Enter the 6-digit code we sent you.
Unable to confirm your phone number
Sorry, we are having trouble sending you a confirmation code.
Digits warning: No active session found. An active session is required to fetch contact matches, store/retrieve invitedPhoneNumbers. Log the user in to have the full experience.
Hi %1$s. I am using %2$s - Join me!
Please check your network and try again.

By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, you are adding this email to your Digits account. You agree that this app and%7$sall apps listed in your Digits account%5$s can access this email address and their users can discover you by email address.

By Tapping %1$sSend confirmation code%1$s above, %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s will send you an SMS to confirm your phone number. On the next screen, you can choose “Resend code” to receive a new SMS or “Call me” to initiate a phone call to confirm your phone number. Message, call & data rates may apply.
By tapping %1$sCall me%1$s above, %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s will send a voice call to confirm your phone number. Call & data rates may apply.

By tapping %1$sCreate account%1$s above, you agree to the %8$sTerms of Service%5$s, %9$sPrivacy Policy%5$s, and %10$sCookies Use%5$s of %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s, to share your phone number with %4$s and that other users of %4$s can discover you by phone number.
By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, your %7$sDigits phone number and/or email address%5$s will be shared with %4$s and other users of %4$s can discover you by phone number and/or email.

By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, you agree to the %8$sTerms of Service%5$s, %9$sPrivacy Policy%5$s and%10$sCookies Use%5$s of %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s, to share your %7$sDigits phone number and/or emailaddress%5$s with %4$s, and other users of %4$s can discover you by phone number and/or email.
Please check your code and try again.
Please check your email and try again.
Please check your number and try again.
Unable to send this number a text message.

"We use Digits by Twitter to find more of your friends who use this app. When you tap OK, we'll upload your address book to Digits by Twitter so that we can help you find users of %1$s that you know or help other users of %1$s find you."
You have previously set a 2-step verification code on digits.com
I’d like to receive news, updates and promotions from McDonald’s via Email
Are you sure you want to cancel the process? You will be logged out
In order to guarantee that you and only you receive our emails we need you to check your inbox and click the link to verify the email.
In order to guarantee that you are the account owner of your email address, please verify your email
The email address and password are not correct
Enter the email and follow the link in your inbox to reset your password
You need to reset your password

If you no longer wish to receive personalised offers based on your preferences and app usage, you need to de-register. If you want to de-register, please visit www.mcdonaldsapps.com/account. If you create a new account on this device, you won’t be able to redeem any offers that were previously redeemed on this device.
Sure you want to log out?
"We've done a lot of changes and can't wait to show them to you. But first some necessities"
Did you have an account in the old app?

The purpose of this App is to provide you with offers based on your preferences and app usage. If you do not want McDonald’s to use your preferences and app usage in this way then you should not proceed to registration. See our Privacy Statement
Please fill in the fields below.
In order to use this section, you need to login or create account.
Email address is in an invalid format
Phone number is in an invalid format
Password need to contains at least 8 characters, 1 uppercase letter and at least 1 digit.
Your phone number already exists. Please try again with another number.
"The email is used for login and password retrieval so make sure it's a valid one."
"McDonald’s can send me information via email and can call me regarding McDonald’s’ products and services. "
Must include 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 digit.
"This app just became so much better and since you're a new member we've packed your offer wallet with some really sweet offers!"
The current password is not correct
I’d like to receive news, updates and promotions from McDonald’s via SMS
I am aged 16 or over and agree to the Terms

The purpose of this App is to provide you with offers based on your preferences and app usage. If you do not want McDonald’s to use your preferences and app usage in this way then you should not proceed to registration. See our Privacy Statement
Read the new terms and agree in order to continue to use our great offers and loyalty cards in the future.
An email has been sent to %s please check your email inbox.
McDonald’s can send me information via email regarding McDonald’s’ products and services
I confirm that I Accept the terms of use and privacy policy and EULA and that I am older than 16 years of age.
Use this button to access the navigation or by swiping from the left edge of the screen
Only available in iOS 10.2 or later
Please grant permission to use the camera
Earn bonus points on first scan
Become a member and get points for some really sweet deals.
Sync your plastic card with the app by pointing the camera to the QR code.
Show the code below to a crew member in the register or press “Add manually” if you order at the kiosk.
"Please note that it can take a few minutes before your purchases are registered. "
That’s all for now but check in later for more!
The deal will be removed, have you used the code?
Points expire 12 months after they were earned
Your account has been locked, please contact support center for assistance
"We're sorry but there seems to be a problem with our system right now. Please try again in a few minutes."
It seems your devices time settings are not correct. Please check your time/date settings and try again.
We cannot access your location, please check your GPS settings.
Unfortunately this section requires that you have an internet connection.
"It appears as if you don't have connection to the internet."
It appears like the application has been installed from unknown source, please install the application from Google play
You need to login in or create an account in order to use our tasty offers. Want to do that now?
To continue using the service, you must download the new version of the app.
An e-mail has been sent to %@ please check your inbox.
I confirm that I Accept the terms of use and privacy policy and eula and that I am older than 16 years of age.
Please confirm the Terms And Condition.
One of the required fields are not filled in.
"We're sorry this function is only available for iOS 9 or later"
Please check back later and there will probably be some loyalty cards here.
Uh-oh! There are no Loyalty cards available right now.
Sign up below and take part in our loyalty cards!
If the scanner does not work you can show this code to the crew member taking your order.
Collect points and get great deals and rewards. It can take up to 3 minutes for your card to update.
Before we enter make sure you have selected the correct country and language
"Bad news first... This app doesn't support the region you selected. The good news is that this region has another app you can use!"
Unfortunately there are no results for your search term.
You can use the McDonald’s app here. Would you like to switch to this region?
Scan or show offer to staff within
Show this code to a staff member at the register or press “Add manually” if you’re at the kiosk.
Are you in our restaurant and ready to redeem this offer now?
Unfortunately, this offer has already been redeemed on this device with a different account.
Please check back later and there will probably be some really great offers here.
Uh-oh! There are no offers available right now.
This offer will only be available
Sign up below and take part of our great offers!
If the scanner does not work you can show this code to the crew member taking your order.
To use this offer scan this QR code at the Kiosk or at the till.
"We can't find any results matching your search query. Please try with different query or try using the map."
Just tap the heart icon for easier access to the information regarding that particular restaurant.
You have not picked any favorite restaurants-yet!
Earn points and use them on great deals.
Welcome to our new deals section!
Scan the code at the top with the scanners at the register, drive thru or kiosk to register your points. When using the kiosk press the \"Scan\" button at the top and then scan the code.

Scan the code you receive once you press redeem in the app. When using the kiosk it’s important that you add the product(s) to your basket. Then press the \"Scan\" button at the top and scan the code for the deal.
Press any QR code to access a numeric code you can state for our staff or the kiosk if the scanners are not working.
Here you will find loyalty cards that will unlock rewards once you collect enough stamps.

Scan the QR code at the top of the screen at the register or kiosk. if you are using a kiosk press the [button]. When your purchase is finished we will update your loyalty cards. This might take a minute or two.

"Sometimes scanners don't work but fortunately you can still use your loyalty cards. Simply show the numeric code that you find under \"Show code\" to the crew member taking your order or if you are at a kiosk please enter the code by pressing the [button]."
Once you have collected enough stamps you will receive a reward that you can redeem at the register or kiosk
When a card is full you receive a reward!
Every now and then we will send you offers that you can use in our restaurants. You can redeem only one offer per order, so choose wisely
"Your offer will only be available for a limited time once you press the 'Redeem' button so make sure you are close to a cashier or kiosk when you do that."
"Scan the QR code at the cashier. If you use the kiosk, select the offer, press “I have a coupon” and then scan the QR code. "

"Sometimes scanners don't work but fortunately you can still use your offer. Simply show at the cashier the numeric code that appears when pressing “Scanner Problems?” or if you are at the kiosk, press the numeric code by pressing “Enter manually”."
"Claiming an offer is simple; once you have tapped the 'Redeem' button, just show your phone to the crew member and they will add the offer to your order."

Allow %1$s to access the email address associated with your Twitter account @%2$s so that %1$s can use it according to its privacy policy. For example, %1$s could send you updates and other information at that address.
"McDonald's would like to use the camera."
We use your position to provide you with local offers as well as show our nearest restaurants.
We use your position while you are using the app to show you valid offers and show you where the closest restaurants are.
Your request to delete account has been confirmed, please notice that the deleting process can take up to a few hours to be completed.
If you delete your account you will lose access to personalised offers and you will lose any loyalty points you might have earned. This action can not be undone.
"Your email address has been successfully verified! if you are interested to receive news letter from McDonald's, please also make sure to switch on the news letter switch."

Our McDonald’s app runs in different markets and each of these markets have their own terms and conditions for using the app. See below for a list of markets that this app will work in and the terms and conditions that are applicable to these markets.
Do like {appDownloads} others have... download our app now!
What’s an app without great deals? Not much if you ask us! That’s why we keep filling our app with brand new deals every now and then.
We’re just around the corner. Find and get info about our restaurants with the help of our map. From opening hours and facts about our restaurants to local offers and events.
It’s fun to play games. It’s even more fun to play games when you can win great deals on delicious products.
Currently available in several countries and in many different languages and the list is constantly growing. Use the app when you’re abroad to get great deals.
The new password needs to contain 8 characters, a capital letter and a digit
An unexpected error occured. Did you open this page from the link that we sent you?
* Reference intake for an adult person (8400 kJ/2000 kcal)
Download the McDonald’s App to have all the offers in the palm of your hand!

"Download the McDonald's™ App for unique offers! Features: - Unique offers always available in the palm of your hand! Use the app to access offers, which you can directly redeem at the cashier of the restaurant with your mobile phone! - Whatever you need to know about McDonald's™: our menu, store finder (by location), new products and new restaurants, nutritional info and even the Happy Meal™ toys of the month! - Enjoy fun moments with games, competitions and tasty gifts! Stay tuned!"
"Thanks for using the McDonald's app! We're constantly working to bring you updates that make the app faster and more reliable. So keep your McDonald's app updated in order not to miss out!"
Your password was successfully reset. Please sign in using your new password.
